text: Robert William Dixon-Smith, Baron Dixon-Smith DL (born 30 September 1934), is a British farmer, and Conservative Party politician. Lord Dixon-Smith is a former Shadow Minister at the Department for Communities and Local Government.Peer's apology over racist phrase BBC News, 9 July 2008 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Conservative Life Peers
title: Robert Dixon-Smith, Baron Dixon-Smith
